extendedInfo.description: If you are Queen's fan, this app is right for you. Whenever you want to check Queen's lyrics, just open this app and choose the lyrics that you want. You don't have to access the internet to get the lyrics. We provide all Queen's lyrics here. In the Album tab, you can choose lyrics based on the album. In All lyrics tab, all of Queen's lyrics are here. You can quickly search the lyrics by using the search bar at the top of the page.Hope you guy enjoy using this app as much as I enjoy developing it. :)************************Main Features ************************- Lyrics categorized by album - Show all lyrics - Search lyrics************************List of albums ************************- Queen- Queen II- Sheer Heart Attack- A Night at the Opera- A Day at the Races- News of the World- Jazz- The Game- Hot Space- The Works- A Kind of Magic- The Miracle- Innuendo- Made in Heaven- The Cosmos Rocks************************List of lyrics ************************- '39- A Kind Of Magic- A Winter's Tale- Action This Day- All Dead, All Dead- All God's People- Another One Bites The Dust- Back Chat- Bet Your Bottom Dollar Bill You're A Playboy- Bicycle Race- Big Bad Caused A Mighty Fine Sensation- Bijou- Body Langauge- Bohemian Rhapsody- Breakthru- Brighton Rock- Bring Back That Leroy Brown- Call Me- Calling All Girls- C-lebrity-
